|brand = ASUS |model = Tinker |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Edge T |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC1200 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = NXP;i.MX8MQ;MIMX8MQ6DVA; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_cores2 = 1 |cpu1_total_cores = 5 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1_type2 = ARM |cpu1_type2_rev = Cortex-M4 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |cpu1spd2 = 266 |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Winbond;W25X05CL; |flash2size = 512 KiB |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Micron;MT53E256M32D2DS-053 WT; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211F; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.03.3;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.98;Debian;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.2 (Gen 1), |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 3 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12-19 |pwr_amp_dc = 3-4 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.5 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = AI Accelerator, HDMI 2.0a, MIPI DSI, MIPI CSI, Bluetooth 4.1 BLE, Micro SD Card slot, I2C, SPI, |addchip = Google Edge TPU ML Accelerator Module;Coral;G313-06329-00;;1;,,, CryptoAuthentication Device;Microchip;ATECC608A;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, Programmable PMIC;Rohm;BD71837;;1;,,, Triple/Quad Output PMIC;Renesas;ISL9130B;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen-2/10Gbps 2:1 Passive MUX;ITE Tech;IT5201;;1;,,, 14A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ Eco-Mode Control;TI;TPS53319;;1;,,, 40 V, 78 A, Single Nâˆ’Channel Power MOSFET;On Semi;NTMFS5C460NL;;1;,,, High-Side Power Distribution Controller;ANPEC;APL3542;;1;,,, Adjustable Current-Limited Power Distribution Switch;TI;TPS2557;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 01/2020 |estprice = 168 |upc = 192876533574 |ean = 4718017533577 |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = N82E16813119241 |asin = B083FM7Y4M |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Murata LBEE5U91CQ |rad1modif = PCIe |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;QCA6174A; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = integrated |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11a/b/g/n/ac |rad1ac = 867 |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1a = 54 |rad1freq = 2.4 or 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{See also|List of Single-board computers}}
===Specifications=== *CPU: ''[[NXP]]'' i.MX8MQ :4x ARM Cortex A53 @1.85GHz :1x ARM Cortex M4 @266MHz *GPU: Vivante GC7000 Lite :4Kp60 HEVC/H.265, H.264, VP9 Decoder :1080p60 MPEG2, MPEG4p2, VC-1, VP8, AVS, MJPEG, H.263 Decoder *NN Processor: Google Edge TPU ML accelerator coprocessor *RAM: 1GB (LPDDR4) *Storage: 8GB eMMC flash + Micro SD(TF) slot *WLAN: 802.11abgn/ac (2T2R) *USB: 2x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type A, :1x USB 3.2 Gen 1 Type C OTG *Power Source: DC Jack 12-19V
===Requirement=== *USB Type-C cable with data transfer function *12~19V power supply *Monitor with HDMI cable, Keyboard and Mouse set
==Links of Interest== *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/01/28/buy-asus-tinker-edge-t-ai-sbc/ ''ASUS Tinker Edge T SBC Launched for $168 and Up'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[http://linuxgizmos.com/asus-launches-coral-based-tinker-edge-t-sbc-for-168/ ''Asus launches Coral-based Tinker Edge T SBC for $168'' on '''LinuxGizmos''']
[[Category:English Documentation]]
